Question: This person later said about that time in her life, "All I learned in drama school was how to be frightened.".
Hints: The following year, this person did a musical on Broadway, Wildcat, co-starring Paula Stewart.
When **** registered to vote in 1936, she listed her party affiliation as Communist.
In 1948, this person was cast as Liz Cugat (later "Cooper"), a wacky wife, in My Favorite Husband, a radio program for CBS Radio.
